about_the_game:
Vast and epic, Nature Soundscapes goes into nature and beyond with this pack of real-world nature sounds and ethereal, droning soundscapes. Dreamy, distant waves of light sound are perfect for your ethereal, galactic games, and nature sounds of course are fantastic for very soft, background, gentle ambience.

Features:

* 30 BGM featuring dreamy, ethereal music and real-world nature sounds
* Nature sounds include rain, wind, bonfire, under sea, and more!
* wav and ogg formats included
* Royalty free music for use with RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

granular_01_God breath
granular_02_time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
